mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.qid, q.text as content, q.ansa as option_a, q.ansb as option_b, q.ansc as option_c, q.ansd as option_d, CASE q.correct WHEN 'A' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 1 WHEN 'C' THEN 2 WHEN 'D' THEN 3 END as correct_index, q.accuracy, COUNT(DISTINCT ar.user_id) as correct_user_count FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer_record ar ON q.id = ar.question_id AND ar.correct = 1 WHERE q.qid = #{qid} GROUP BY q.id, q.qid, q.text, q.ansa, q.ansb, q.ansc, q.ansd, q.correct, q.accuracy ORDER BY q.id ASC
